<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Ogre Boss](/Monsters.aspx?ID=319)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

In ogre society, might makes more than right—it makes the rules. The strongest or most violent ogre in a family (in most cases, this is the same ogre) is invariably that family’s boss. Quick to hook fallen foes on their weapons, even other ogres fear the repercussions of displeasing an ogre boss. When an ogre boss barks out commands, the other members of the family move quickly to obey.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 23

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Ogre_OgreBoss.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Ogre Boss](/Monsters.aspx?ID=319)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Giant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=79" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 253</row>

**Perception** +12; darkvision

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +16, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +16, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +0

**Con** +4

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10), [_+1 ogre hook_](/Weapons.aspx?ID=86), [Javelin](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71) (6)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +17 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +15 

</row>

**HP** 130

**Attack of Opportunity** <actions string="Reaction" />

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
ogre hook +19 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d10+11 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
javelin +12 ([thrown 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+11 piercing

**Bellowing Command** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101)) The ogre boss issues a command to hasten their fellows. Each ogre ally who hears and understands this command becomes quickened until the end of that ally's next turn, but can use the extra action only to Step or Stride.

**Sweeping Hook** <actions string="Reaction" />  **Trigger** The ogre boss successfully Trips a creature using an ogre hook. **Effect** The ogre boss makes an ogre hook Strike against the creature they tripped.

</column>
